welcome_message_body: Welcome to Matamoros, where the rich history and vibrant culture await you. Enjoy our delicious cuisine, beautiful architecture, and friendly locals as you explore all that our charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Arabia Foods
restaurants.description: Arabia Foods is a mexican restaurant located in Matamoros.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Francisco Sarabia Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
